title: 'Inspire Dreamers Day' for college planning
text:

Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs 'Inspire Dreamers Day' for college planning Blair Shiff, KUSA 8:58 a.m. MDT October 23, 2015 Hinkley High School Change Agents (Photo: Inspire) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
KUSA - About 150 high school students will get their chance to achieve their dreams, even without documentation to be in the United States. 
The group - INSPiRE - is hosting INSPiRE DREAMer Day at the University of Denver. 
Jesse Ramirez is the cofounder and CEO of Inspire. He spoke to 9NEWS Friday morning about their goal to offer expertise and support to those hoping to further their education. 
Ricardo also joined 9NEWS on Friday. He was a participant in 2014, and now, he's studying at the Community College of Denver. 
The event will take place at DU's Strum Hall on Friday. 
Find out more about the program here: https://www.facebook.com/COLORADOINSPIRES.
